Submodules¶

src.mesh_add module¶

class src.mesh_add.VIEW3D_MT_mesh_imvu¶

Bases: bpy.types.Menu

Outlines menu layout for imvu mesh primitives.

bl_idname: str = 'VIEW3D_MT_mesh_imvu'¶

If this is set, the menu gets a custom ID, otherwise it takes the name of the class used to define the menu (for example, if the class name is “OBJECT_MT_hello”, and bl_idname is not set by the script, then bl_idname = “OBJECT_MT_hello”)

Type

str

bl_label: str = 'IMVU'¶

The menu label

Type

str

draw(context)¶

Determines the order of imvu submenus in the mesh add menu.

Parameters

() (context) – A bpy context containing data in the current 3d view.

class src.mesh_add.VIEW3D_MT_mesh_imvu_female¶

Bases: bpy.types.Menu

Outlines submenu layout for imvu female mesh primitives.

bl_idname: str = 'VIEW3D_MT_mesh_imvu_female'¶

If this is set, the menu gets a custom ID, otherwise it takes the name of the class used to define the menu (for example, if the class name is “OBJECT_MT_hello”, and bl_idname is not set by the script, then bl_idname = “OBJECT_MT_hello”)

Type

str

src.mesh_export module¶

class src.mesh_export.CalMeshExporter¶

Bases: bpy.types.Operator, bpy_extras.io_utils.ExportHelper

Exports selected objects as a Cal3D XMF file.

bl_idname: str = 'export_scene.export_xmf'¶

str

Type

type

bl_label: str = 'Export XMF'¶

str

Type

type

bl_options: typing.Union[typing.Set[str], typing.Set[int]] = {'PRESET', 'REGISTER'}¶

Options for this operator type * REGISTER Register, Display in the info window and support the redo toolbar panel. * UNDO Undo, Push an undo event (needed for operator redo). * UNDO_GROUPED Grouped Undo, Push a single undo event for repeated instances of this operator. * BLOCKING Blocking, Block anything else from using the cursor. * MACRO Macro, Use to check if an operator is a macro. * GRAB_CURSOR Grab Pointer, Use so the operator grabs the mouse focus, enables wrapping when continuous grab is enabled. * GRAB_CURSOR_X Grab Pointer X, Grab, only warping the X axis. * GRAB_CURSOR_Y Grab Pointer Y, Grab, only warping the Y axis. * PRESET Preset, Display a preset button with the operators settings. * INTERNAL Internal, Removes the operator from search results.

Type

typing.Union[typing.Set[str], typing.Set[int]]

body: None¶
bone: None¶
bone_items(context) → list¶

Outputs dynamic bone menu configuration.

Parameters

() (context) – A bpy context containing data in the current 3d view.

Returns

A list of tuples defining bones in the menu.

cancel(context)¶

Specifies abrupt cancellation behaviour.

Parameters

() (context) – A bpy context containing data in the current 3d view.

Returns

A set containing the failure state of the method.

draw(context)¶

Determines the format for showing options in the file export dialog menu.

Parameters

() (context) – A bpy context containing data in the current 3d view.

execute(context)¶

Calls xmf file generation method.

Parameters

() (context) – A bpy context containing data in the current 3d view.

Returns

A set containing the success state of the method.

src.skeleton module¶

class src.skeleton.DefaultSkeleton¶

Bases: bpy.types.Operator

Adds default imvu armature to scene

bl_idname: str = 'object.armature_imvu_skeleton_add'¶

str

Type

type

bl_label: str = 'IMVU Master Root'¶

str

Type

type

bl_options: Union[Set[str], Set[int]] = {'REGISTER', 'UNDO'}¶

Options for this operator type * REGISTER Register, Display in the info window and support the redo toolbar panel. * UNDO Undo, Push an undo event (needed for operator redo). * UNDO_GROUPED Grouped Undo, Push a single undo event for repeated instances of this operator. * BLOCKING Blocking, Block anything else from using the cursor. * MACRO Macro, Use to check if an operator is a macro. * GRAB_CURSOR Grab Pointer, Use so the operator grabs the mouse focus, enables wrapping when continuous grab is enabled. * GRAB_CURSOR_X Grab Pointer X, Grab, only warping the X axis. * GRAB_CURSOR_Y Grab Pointer Y, Grab, only warping the Y axis. * PRESET Preset, Display a preset button with the operators settings. * INTERNAL Internal, Removes the operator from search results.

Type

typing.Union[typing.Set[str], typing.Set[int]]

execute(context)¶

Calls armature generation method.

Parameters

() (context) – A bpy context containing data in the current 3d view.

Returns

A set containing the success state of the method.
